description: Allows the mob to stop and sneeze possibly startling nearby mobs and dropping an item.
title: Sneeze

probability.title: Probability
probability.description: The probability of sneezing. A value of 1.00 is 100%.

cooldown_time.title: Cooldown Time
cooldown_time.description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again.

within_radius.title: Within Radius
within_radius.description: Distance in blocks that mobs will be startled.

entity_types.title: Entity Types
entity_types.description: List of entity types this mob will startle (cause to jump) when it sneezes.

drop_item_chance.title: Drop Item Chance
drop_item_chance.description: The probability that the mob will drop an item when it sneezes.

loot_table.title: Loot Table
loot_table.description: Loot table to select dropped items from.

prepare_sound.title: Prepare Sound
prepare_sound.description: Sound to play when the sneeze is about to happen.

prepare_time.title: Prepare Time
prepare_time.description: The time in seconds that the mob takes to prepare to sneeze (while the prepare_sound is playing).

sound.title: Sound
sound.description: Sound to play when the sneeze occurs.
